sentences: He learnt to play the trumpet at the age of five, became a pupil at the Conservatoire de Charleville-Mézières in 1984, and gained his diploma at the Conservatoire de Nancy in 1989.
2003 Napoli's Walls, ECM, with Louis Sclavis
2005 "Lunfardo", record label Chief Inspector (200509), Sébastien Gaxie
